introduce.name: introduce
introduce.title: What is Nail Designs
introduce.label: Introduce
introduce.description: Nail Designs is an AI-powered tool that allows you to design your own nail art before your next manicure. Simply describe your desired style and our AI will generate stunning, personalized nail designs in seconds.

items.title: AI-Generated Designs
items.description: Our advanced AI creates unique nail designs based on your descriptions.

items.title: Variety of Styles
items.description: From elegant to psychedelic, create any nail style you can imagine.

items.title: Save Your Designs
items.description: Download and save your designs to show your nail artist.

benefit.name: benefit
benefit.title: Why Choose Nail Designs
benefit.label: Benefits
benefit.description: Experience the future of nail art with our powerful AI design tool.

items.title: Preview Before You Commit
items.description: See exactly how your nail design will look before visiting your nail technician.

items.title: Unleash Your Creativity
items.description: No design skills needed - just describe what you want and our AI does the rest.

items.title: Perfect For Everyone
items.description: Whether you're a nail enthusiast or a professional nail artist looking for inspiration.

usage.name: usage
usage.title: How AI Nail Design Works
usage.description: Create stunning, personalized nail art in three simple steps:

items.title: Describe
items.description: Describe your desired nail design in detail - colors, patterns, themes, or any inspiration.

items.title: Generate
items.description: Our AI will instantly generate personalized nail designs based on your description.

items.title: Download
items.description: Save your favorite designs to your library or download to share with your nail artist.

items.title: Show Your Artist
items.description: Bring your design to your next appointment for a perfect match to your vision.

feature.name: feature
feature.title: Key Features of Nail Designs
feature.description: Everything you need to create the perfect nail design.

items.title: Easy Sharing

items.title: Multi-Device Support
items.description: Access your designs from any device - desktop, tablet, or mobile.

items.title: Daily Free Designs
items.description: Registered users get 5 free designs daily to try out different ideas.

testimonial.name: testimonial
testimonial.label: Testimonial
testimonial.title: What Users Say About Nail Designs
testimonial.description: Hear from our community of nail enthusiasts and professionals.

items.title: Sarah Johnson
items.label: Nail Enthusiast
items.description: I used to struggle explaining what I wanted to my nail tech. Now I just show them my AI designs and get exactly what I want every time!

items.title: Jessica Kim
items.label: Professional Nail Artist
items.description: This tool has transformed my business. My clients love browsing design ideas before their appointments, and it's boosted my creativity too!

items.title: Michael Rodriguez
items.label: Salon Owner
items.description: We've integrated Nail Designs into our booking process. Clients design their nails when making appointments, making our service much more efficient.

items.title: Emily Chen
items.label: Regular Customer
items.description: I'm obsessed with changing my nail style and this lets me experiment with so many designs without commitment. The AI is surprisingly accurate!

items.title: Olivia Wilson
items.label: Fashion Blogger
items.description: As someone who features nail art on my blog, this tool is a game-changer for planning content and coordinating nail designs with outfits.

items.title: David Thompson
items.label: Nail Product Developer
items.description: We use Nail Designs to visualize how our new polish colors will look in different patterns. It's become an essential part of our product development.

faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Have another question? Contact us by email or social media.

items.title: How accurate are the AI-generated nail designs?
items.description: Our AI creates highly accurate representations of your descriptions. While the final result from your nail technician may vary slightly depending on their skill and available materials, our designs provide an excellent visual reference.

items.title: Can I use the designs if I'm not a professional?
items.description: Absolutely! Nail Designs is perfect for anyone who wants to visualize nail art before getting it done. Simply show the design to your nail technician at your next appointment.

items.title: How many designs can I create with the free plan?
items.description: Free plan users can create 5 designs per day. These designs are saved to your library and can be accessed at any time, even if you don't create new ones.

items.title: Can I edit the designs after they're generated?
items.description: Currently, we don't offer editing tools, but you can regenerate designs by adjusting your description until you get the perfect result. We're working on adding editing features in future updates.

items.title: Do you offer designs for special occasions?
items.description: Yes! You can request designs for any occasion - weddings, holidays, birthdays, etc. Just include details about the event in your description for themed nail art.

items.title: Can nail technicians and salons use these designs commercially?
items.description: Yes, with our Professional plan, nail technicians and salons can use our designs commercially, including in their portfolios, social media, and marketing materials.
